Menace
[i]Lone-Moon Strike[/i] – Whenever Shamir, Lone-Moon Ninja enters, if no mana was spent to cast her, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Ninjutsu {U}{B} [i]({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
